title: New Fiora looks broken as hell
body:
Passive: Fiora deals bonus true damage while healing her and granting her a movement speed bonus. Cooldown looks rather short.

Q: Lunge: Small skillshot looks to be about the size of Grave's E that prioritizes champions, applies on hit effects, and cooldown is lowered if she strikes an enemy.

W: Line skillshot that blocks enemy basic attacks and hard cc for .5s, If she blocks enemy CC it stuns the target otherwise it slows them.

E: Next two basic attacks have increased attack speed, the first attack slows but cannot crit but the second attack is a gauranteed crit.

R: Targets enemy champion, attacking their "vital spots" dealing Max Percent Health TRUE DAMAGE. If she destroys all 4 weak spots before the target dies she creates an AoE heal that heals her and her allies.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-update/champion-update-fiora
